# -*- CMakeLists.txt generated by CodeLite IDE. Do not edit by hand -*-

cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.8.11)

project(FSMConfig_Server)

# Define some variables
set(PROJECT_PATH "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server")



#{{{{ User Code 1
# Place your code here
#}}}}

include_directories(
    .
    .
    cpp

)


# Compiler options
add_definitions(-std=c++11  -pthread -I/usr/local/include -O2)
add_definitions(-Wall)
add_definitions(-O2)
add_definitions(
    -DNDEBUG
)


# Linker options
set(LINK_OPTIONS -L/usr/local/lib -lprotobuf -pthread -lgrpc++ -lgrpc -lfsmcck)


if(WIN32)
    # Resource options
endif(WIN32)

# Library path
set(CMAKE_LDFLAGS "${CMAKE_LDFLAGS} -L. ")

# Define the CXX sources
set ( CXX_SRCS
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/main.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/CCKConfigServiceImpl.cpp
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/fsm_cckconfig_clientinfo.pb.cc
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/fsm_cckconfig_MN.pb.cc
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/fsm_cckconfig_MN401.pb.cc
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/fsm_cckconfig_PO.pb.cc
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/fsm_cckconfig_service.grpc.pb.cc
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/fsm_cckconfig_service.pb.cc
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/fsm_cckconfig_VirtPO.pb.cc
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/FSMConfig_Server/cpp/nanopb.pb.cc
)

set_source_files_properties(
    ${CXX_SRCS} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS 
    " -std=c++11  -pthread -I/usr/local/include -O2 -Wall")

if(WIN32)
    enable_language(RC)
    set(CMAKE_RC_COMPILE_OBJECT
        "<CMAKE_RC_COMPILER> ${RC_OPTIONS} -O coff -i <SOURCE> -o <OBJECT>")
endif(WIN32)



#{{{{ User Code 2
# Place your code here
#}}}}

add_executable(FSMConfig_Server ${RC_SRCS} ${CXX_SRCS} ${C_SRCS})
target_link_libraries(FSMConfig_Server ${LINK_OPTIONS})



#{{{{ User Code 3
# Place your code here
#}}}}
